content: valentine s day heart plushie crochet pattern love is in the air as valentine s day approaches once again from heart-shaped chocolates to romantic candlelit dinners the holiday is all about expressing our love for those we hold dear materials hobbii honey bunny in candyfloss tomato and bordeaux 1 skeins each j/6 0 mm hook yarn needle scissors fiber fill stitch markers written in us terms this heart is made in 3 sizes small 6″ medium 8″ large 10″
